original_text: And the Lord rejected all the descendants of Israel and afflicted them and gave them into the hand of plunderers, until he had cast them out of his sight.
korean_text: 여호와께서 이스라엘의 온 족속을 버리사 괴롭게 하시며 노략꾼의 손에 넘기시고 마침내 그의 앞에서 쫓아내시니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord rejected all the descendants of Israel
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 주께서는 이스라엘의 모든 자손을 버리셨다

sentences.original_text: and gave them into the hand of plunderers
until he had cast them out of his sight
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그들을 자기 앞에서 쫓아낼 때까지
